Turns podcasts into transcripts and summaries

Related repos

  • AI tool for transcribing and summarizing videos from YouTube, TikTok, Bilibili, and more
  • Podcast production agent for transcripts and chapters
  • AI tool for auto-generating podcasts from news using Groq and ElevenLabs
  • Turns research papers into podcasts

  • generate transcripts from YouTube videos automatically
